sub_title: Research I Remote Sensing I GIS I Programming (SPSS, STATA, ATLAS, Programming R, Tygron),  Project Management I Data Analysis
summary: I have been completed Masters programme from Institute for Housing and Urban Development Studies (IHS), Erasmus University, Rotterdam in 2021. My specialization track was Urban Environment, Sustainability and Climate Change. I have been graduated from Urban and Regional Planning, Jahangirnagar University, Bangladesh. I worked as a consultant in different government (LGED) and private organization (CEGIS, AQUA,DCCI). My goal is to be a professional consultant in national or international arena.
